about_the_game:
This Game is in Early Development

Genre: Bullet Hell, Fantasy, Action-RPG

Story:

Knightguard has been taken over by Skeletron. An undead king that was bested many centres ago, by a small group of heroes. Unfortunately, the Revenants resurrected Skeletron so he could bring back chaos and destruction. Three new heroes who aren’t aware of what’s to come, must band together to fight against Skeletron and his horde of evil minions. To bring peace and tranquillity back to the kingdom of Knightguard. Or that’s what they thought…

Progression:

Unlock gear from exploration, side guests and combat. Each level has unique gear to be obtained. Gold is used for purchasing gear, skills and upgrading equipment. Enjoy a particle weapon or build, upgrade your gear so you can continue to use it until you unlock a better version.

Difficulty:

Beat normal mode to unlock heroic mode and then nightmare mode. Each difficulty has new areas throughout each level, more secrets, new loot, new NPC's, improved/different enemies, new mini games, extra boss phases, new side quests and visual differences.

Endgame:

On nightmare mode you will encounter exotic gear quests, secret raid bosses, unique rarity gear, secret alterative ending. There's optional content with collecting cards or progression, etc with certain mini games, that transfers between each difficulty and level.

Classes:

There's three playable characters. Each class has 2 mobility options, 1 main ability and 3 sub abilities. Only one sub class ability, can be equipped while using your main ability.

Magnus | Void Caster: Magnus use to be a healer at a chapel in Knightguard, where he would heal wounded soldiers, but he wanted more out of life and devoted his time on mastering the art of dark magic instead. Now Magnus lives on the outskirts of town, working on perfecting his magic.
  • Race: Human, White Skin, Male
  • Mobility: Dodge Roll, Blink
  • Main Class Ability: Nova Bomb
  • Sub Class Abilities: Null Realm, Abyssal Ward, Deception

Evelyn | Sharpshooter: Evelyn is one of the towns best hunters. Her parents died when she was just a child, so she became independent at a very young age. She used to pick pockets to make ends meat, but a man named Melvin took her under his wing and trained her to hunt animals.
  • Race: High Elf, Pinkish White Skin, Female
  • Mobility: Dodge Roll, Dash
  • Main Class Ability: Longshot
  • Sub Class Abilities: Hunters Mark, Natures Blessing, Vanish

Lucas | Vanguard: Lucas is the king’s personal guard. He use to fight on the front lines, but the king personally choose Lucas to work for him. Lucas accepted the job, because his wages where more than quadrupled. He now has a wife and child. He has settled for this quite life, but he keeps thinking back to the good old days.
  • Race: Human, Light Brown Skin, Male
  • Mobility: Dodge Roll, Guard
  • Main Class Ability: Barrier
  • Sub Class Abilities: Spartan Rage, Juggernaut, Intimidation
